languages.text: "В такие моменты я задумываюсь, как видит подобные места Глейто со всеми его сенсорами в носу — и тут же даю себе приказ думать о чем-то другом".
languages.translation_comment:
While exploring the flagship's lower decks.
Cassia: "Do we truly... have to be here? I am not even sure what is making me more nauseous: these horrid colours, or the smell..."

traits.locale_text: "В такие моменты я задумываюсь, как видит подобные места Глейто со всеми его сенсорами в носу — и тут же даю себе приказ думать о чем-то другом".

languages.text: "At moments like this, I sometimes wonder how Glaito perceives such environments, what with all the sensors in his nose — and then I always order myself to think about something else."
languages.translation_comment:
While exploring the flagship's lower decks.
Cassia: "Do we truly... have to be here? I am not even sure what is making me more nauseous: these horrid colours, or the smell..."
languages.original_text: "В такие моменты я задумываюсь, как видит подобные места Глейто со всеми его сенсорами в носу — и тут же даю себе приказ думать о чем-то другом".

traits.locale_text: "At moments like this, I sometimes wonder how Glaito perceives such environments, what with all the sensors in his nose — and then I always order myself to think about something else."
"At moments like this, I sometimes wonder how Glaito perceives such environments, what with all the sensors in his nose — and then I always order myself to think about something else."
"At moments like this, I sometimes wonder how Glaito perceives such environments, what with all the sensors in his nose — and then I always order myself to think about something else."
"At moments like this, I sometimes wonder how Glaito perceives such environments, what with all the sensors in his nose — and then I always order myself to think about something else."
"At moments like this, I sometimes wonder how Glaito perceives such environments, what with all the sensors in his nose — and then I always order myself to think about something else."
"At moments like this, I sometimes wonder how Glaito perceives such environments, what with all the sensors in his nose — and then I always order myself to think about something else."

languages.text: 「こんな時、グライトの鼻にはあれだけのセンサーがあるのに、彼にはこの環境がどう感じられているのかと思うことがあります。そして毎回、そんなことは考えるなと自分に言い聞かせています」
languages.original_text: "At moments like this, I sometimes wonder how Glaito perceives such environments, what with all the sensors in his nose — and then I always order myself to think about something else."

traits.locale_text: 「こんな時、グライトの鼻にはあれだけのセンサーがあるのに、彼にはこの環境がどう感じられているのかと思うことがあります。そして毎回、そんなことは考えるなと自分に言い聞かせています」

languages.text: "In solchen Augenblicken frage ich mich manchmal, wie Glaito solche Umgebungen wahrnimmt, mit all den Sensoren in seiner Nase. Und dann zwinge ich mich immer, an etwas anderes zu denken."
languages.original_text: "At moments like this, I sometimes wonder how Glaito perceives such environments, what with all the sensors in his nose — and then I always order myself to think about something else."

traits.locale_text: "In solchen Augenblicken frage ich mich manchmal, wie Glaito solche Umgebungen wahrnimmt, mit all den Sensoren in seiner Nase. Und dann zwinge ich mich immer, an etwas anderes zu denken."

languages.text: « Dans ces moments-là, je me demande parfois comment Glaito perçoit de tels environnements, avec tous les capteurs dans son nez... puis je me force à penser à autre chose. »
languages.original_text: "At moments like this, I sometimes wonder how Glaito perceives such environments, what with all the sensors in his nose — and then I always order myself to think about something else."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ces moments-là, je me demande parfois comment Glaito perçoit de tels environnements, avec tous les capteurs dans son nez... puis je me force à penser à autre chose. »

languages.text: «En momentos como este, a veces me pregunto cómo percibe Glaito estos entornos con todos esos sensores que tiene en el morro... y luego siempre me obligo a mí mismo a pensar en otra cosa».
languages.original_text: "At moments like this, I sometimes wonder how Glaito perceives such environments, what with all the sensors in his nose — and then I always order myself to think about something else."

traits.locale_text: «En momentos como este, a veces me pregunto cómo percibe Glaito estos entornos con todos esos sensores que tiene en el morro... y luego siempre me obligo a mí mismo a pensar en otra cosa».

languages.text: “每当这种时候，我都很想知道格雷托究竟是如何忍受这种环境的，它鼻子里装着那么多传感器……之后，我就会强迫自己去想些别的事情。”
languages.original_text: "At moments like this, I sometimes wonder how Glaito perceives such environments, what with all the sensors in his nose — and then I always order myself to think about something else."

traits.locale_text: “每当这种时候，我都很想知道格雷托究竟是如何忍受这种环境的，它鼻子里装着那么多传感器……之后，我就会强迫自己去想些别的事情。”

languages.text: "Bu gibi anlarda Glaito'nun böyle ortamları burnundaki sensörlerle nasıl algıladığını merak ederim. Sonra kendimi başka bir şey düşünmeye zorlarım."
languages.original_text: "At moments like this, I sometimes wonder how Glaito perceives such environments, what with all the sensors in his nose — and then I always order myself to think about something else."

traits.locale_text: "Böyle anlarda Glaito'nun böyle ortamları burnundaki sensörlerle nasıl algıladığını merak ederim. Sonra kendimi başka bir şey düşünmeye zorlarım."

languages.original_text: "At moments like this, I sometimes wonder how Glaito perceives such environments, what with all the sensors in his nose — and then I always order myself to think about something else."
